title: Gallery Conversation: What is Prayer? (Nov 10)
short_description: Museum educators Marielle Epstein and Sam Ramos lead a conversation and a tour of artworks that invite us to reflect on the practice of prayer.
description: Museum educators Marielle Epstein and Sam Ramos lead a tour of artworks that invite us to reflect on the practice of prayer. What is prayer? What can it look like? Why do we do it? Is prayer always religious? These are only some of the many questions to be considered as we reflect on this intimate ritual that transcends faiths, cultures, and eras.
